DOC.brief_summary: This phase I , single centre , randomise , double blind , double-dummy , placebo control , parallel group single-dose study healthy volunteer . The purpose study assess effect single-dose administration GSK424887 , potent , selective competitive antagonist human Neurokinin 1 ( NK1 ) receptor potent inhibitor human serotonin transporter ( SERT ) , maximum dosage 100 mg versus placebo versus citalopram ( 20 mg ) emotional processing healthy male volunteer . Pharmacokinetics safety follow oral administration GSK424887 also evaluate . An Emotional Test Battery ( ETB ) previously use characterise effect antidepressant positive negative emotion process Healthy Volunteers patient use . We hypothesise GSK424887 modulate emotional information processing acutely . We anticipate effect may manifest sub-effective level NK1 SERT receptor occupancy , thus provide pharmacodynamic evidence synergistic interaction two mechanism human .
